reviews.review_msg: Nils Bruin is not a useful teacher. The facts are that he does not prepare proper lecture notes. He does not care about his students and he gets annoyed from questions and interaction. Nils can't teach (thats why he is at SFU, not UBC). He definitely is not up to standards and I am surprised that he is even working at SFU..
mission impossible.. how can i go over this course.... his writing is horrible.. and he teaches a very important section in 5mins. and done!?
Absolutely horrible prof.  Very distracting and has absolutely no idea how to communicate to students.  Hard tests out of very few marks.  Avoid at all costs or you will be sorry!!!

One of the worst profs i've had.  He has no idea how to communicate to the students, his writing is oh so hard to read, and his bouncing around during class is very distracting.  Avoid him at ALL costs!!! or you will be VERY sorry!!!
Almost as good as MATH814, Algebraic Curves or MATH438, Linear Algebra
